## Setup Instructions

This page provides simple instructions to install R and all required packages for the workshop.

## Step 1: Install R and RStudio

### Install R
1. Go to [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/)
2. Download R for your operating system (Windows, Mac, or Linux)
3. Run the installer and follow the instructions

### Install RStudio
1. Go to [Posit RStudio](https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/)
2. Download the free RStudio Desktop
3. Install RStudio after R is installed

## Step 2: Install Required R Packages

Open RStudio and run the following commands to install all necessary packages:

```r
# Core DataSHIELD packages
install.packages("DSI", repos = c("https://cran.obiba.org", "https://cloud.r-project.org"))
install.packages("DSOpal", repos = c("https://cran.obiba.org", "https://cloud.r-project.org"))
install.packages("dsBaseClient", repos = c("https://cran.obiba.org", "https://cloud.r-project.org"))

# Install devtools for GitHub installations
install.packages("devtools")

# DataSHIELD helper packages
devtools::install_github("timcadman/ds-helper")

# dsOMOP packages
devtools::install_github('isglobal-brge/dsOMOPClient')
devtools::install_github('isglobal-brge/dsOMOPHelper')

# Statistical analysis packages
install.packages("metafor")

# Basic data manipulation (if not already installed)
install.packages("readr")
install.packages("knitr")

# Additional packages for advanced workshops (optional)
install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("dsOmicsClient", ask = FALSE)
```

## Step 3: Verify Installation

Run this code to check that packages are installed correctly:

```r
# Load main packages
library(DSI)
library(DSOpal)
library(dsBaseClient)
library(dsHelper)
library(metafor)

# Check DataSHIELD functions are available
print("DataSHIELD packages loaded successfully!")

# Check package versions
cat("Package versions:\n")
cat("DSI:", as.character(packageVersion("DSI")), "\n")
cat("DSOpal:", as.character(packageVersion("DSOpal")), "\n")
cat("dsBaseClient:", as.character(packageVersion("dsBaseClient")), "\n")
```

## Troubleshooting

### Common Installation Issues

**If a package fails to install:**
```r
# Try installing from CRAN only
install.packages("package_name", repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org")

# Or try updating R if packages require newer version
# Then reinstall the package
```

**For GitHub packages that fail:**
```r
# Make sure devtools is installed and loaded
install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)

# If still failing, try:
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("username/repository")
```

**On Windows:** You may need to install Rtools from [CRAN Rtools](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/)

**On Mac:** You may need Xcode Command Line Tools. Install by running in Terminal:
```bash
xcode-select --install
```
